    Creates or Updates a RecordSet within a DNS zone.

    public static RecordSet CreateOrUpdate(this IRecordSetsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string zoneName, string relativeRecordSetName, RecordType recordType, RecordSet parameters, string ifMatch = null, string ifNoneMatch = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function CreateOrUpdate(operations As IRecordSetsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, zoneName As String, relativeRecordSetName As String, recordType As RecordType, parameters As RecordSet, ifMatch As String = Nothing, ifNoneMatch As String = Nothing) As RecordSet

    Parameters

    • operations

      IRecordSetsOperations

      The operations group for this extension method.

      String
      String

      The name of the resource group.

    • zoneName
      String
      String

      The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

    • relativeRecordSetName
      String
      String

      The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.

    • recordType
      RecordType
      RecordType

      The type of DNS record. Possible values include: 'A', 'AAAA', 'CNAME', 'MX', 'NS', 'PTR', 'SOA', 'SRV', 'TXT'

      RecordSet
      RecordSet

      Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

    • ifMatch
      String
      String

      The etag of Recordset.

    • ifNoneMatch
      String
      String

      Defines the If-None-Match condition. Set to '*' to force Create-If-Not-Exist. Other values will be ignored.

    Returns

    public static void Delete(this IRecordSetsOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string zoneName, string relativeRecordSetName, RecordType recordType, string ifMatch = null, string ifNoneMatch = null)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Sub Delete(operations As IRecordSetsOperations, resourceGroupName As String, zoneName As String, relativeRecordSetName As String, recordType As RecordType, ifMatch As String = Nothing, ifNoneMatch As String = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • operations
      IRecordSetsOperations
      IRecordSetsOperations

      The operations group for this extension method.

    • resourceGroupName
      String
      String

      The name of the resource group.

    • zoneName
      String
      String

      The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

    • relativeRecordSetName
      String
      String

      The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.

    • recordType
      RecordType
      RecordType

      The type of DNS record. Possible values include: 'A', 'AAAA', 'CNAME', 'MX', 'NS', 'PTR', 'SOA', 'SRV', 'TXT'

    • ifMatch
      String
      String

      Defines the If-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server matches this value.

    • ifNoneMatch
      String
      String

      Defines the If-None-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server does not match this value.
